Package org.eclipse.imagen.media.colorindexer

Class PackedHistogram

Object
PackedHistogram
public class PackedHistogram extends Object
Builds a histogram of a certain image making sure that we don't end up with too many entries. If the unique colors in the image go above Short.MAX_VALUE the histogram will apply a bit shift on each color component in order to reduce the unique color count. Most vector maps with alpha channel and antialiasing don't actually need the shift, but satellite and aerial imagery often does
Author:
Andrea Aime - GeoSolutions
